Interacts with the remote MCP server at https://mcp.vam.ac.uk/mcp/ to
search, extract, and visualise data from the V&A museum.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`mcp_connect()`](https://JohnGavin.github.io/llm/vanda/reference/mcp_connect.md)
  : Connect to V&A MCP Server
- [`mcp_extract()`](https://JohnGavin.github.io/llm/vanda/reference/mcp_extract.md)
  : Extract Object Data
- [`mcp_search()`](https://JohnGavin.github.io/llm/vanda/reference/mcp_search.md)
  : Search V&A Collections
- [`vanda_visualise()`](https://JohnGavin.github.io/llm/vanda/reference/vanda_visualise.md)
  : Visualise Search Results
